nodes.text: Reese was a male member of the Lok Revenants around 32 BBY.

Reese was at Nym's Base when it was attacked by the Trade Federation. When Evac 1 had engine relay problem, Reese was the one to fix the relay, enabling the transport to take off from the besieged base. Unfortunately for Reese, Evac 1 barely made it to the edge of the base before being bombed and destroyed by Trade Federation droid bombers.
